programme.title: 'Tis the Season to Be Irish
programme.desc: Rose tries to flip a house in Ireland but is blocked by Sean, a handsome local who wants to preserve the historic cottage.

programme.title: A Merry Scottish Christmas
programme.desc: When estranged siblings Lindsay and Brad Morgan travel to Scotland at Christmas to reunite with their mother Jo, a big family secret is revealed.

programme.title: Christmas Getaway
programme.desc: After a surprising breakup with her boyfriend, a travel writer decides to go on the picturesque Christmas vacation planned for the two of them, alone.

programme.title: A Very Merry Bridesmaid
programme.desc: Leah's 30th birthday is on Christmas Eve, the same day as her brother's wedding. Her childhood crush is back in town for the ceremony, and he's determined to make sure her special day doesn't go by the wayside.

programme.title: Snow Bride
programme.desc: A tabloid reporter races to find juicy gossip on a prominent political family. She ends up spending the week before Christmas with the family and falls for one of their sons.

programme.title: Reunited at Christmas
programme.desc: As a child, Samantha spent every Christmas at her beloved Nana's house building the traditions of fun and joy with her family. Sam is facing the first Christmas without Nana and still struggling to find the Christmas spirit when she gets a surprise.

programme.title: Friends & Family Christmas
programme.desc: Overwhelmed by Christmas events and a surprise visit from her parents, photographer Dani asks lawyer Amelia for help. Pretending to date is the perfect solution -- until real feelings develop.

programme.title: It's Christmas, Eve
programme.desc: A school superintendent with a knack for turning around schools meets a single father who works as the head of the school's bankrupt music department. As she rediscovers her passion for music, she works to save the dreams of the kids who love music.

programme.title: You, Me & the Christmas Trees
programme.desc: An arborist falls in love with a farmer as she tries to save his trees before the town tree lighting.

programme.title: Everything Christmas
programme.desc: A woman and her roommate embark on a road trip to Yuletide Springs, a town where Christmas is celebrated year-round.

programme.title: Switched for Christmas
programme.desc: At their obligatory pre-Christmas lunch, estranged identical twins decide to swap lives up until Christmas Day.

programme.title: Christmas in Notting Hill
programme.desc: Always too busy for love, famous soccer star Graham Savoy soon has a change of heart when he meets a visiting American during Christmastime.

programme.title: Magic in Mistletoe
programme.desc: When Harrington Davis, author of the popular book series "Magic in Mistletoe," loses his holiday spirit, his publicist, April, must step in to help him save his career and find the magic again.

programme.title: Our Holiday Story
programme.desc: A loving couple shares the story of how they met and fell in love when their daughter's boyfriend comes to meet them for the first time at Christmas.

programme.title: Three Wise Men and a Baby
programme.desc: Three brothers get the surprise of their lives when they are forced to work together and care for a baby over the holidays.

programme.title: A Royal Christmas Crush
programme.desc: Ava accepts the opportunity of a lifetime to work at the Royal Ice Hotel, which leads to a surprise whirlwind romance with the most important guest of all, the prince himself.

programme.title: Good Morning Christmas!
programme.desc: Two squabbling TV hosts travel to a small town over Christmas, and while pretending to get along for the sake of appearances, they slowly discover there is more to each other than they thought.

programme.title: Christmas at Dollywood
programme.desc: When a NYC event planner returns to Tennessee to organize the Christmas celebration at Dollywood, she's paired with the head of operations who thinks he can handle the party just fine on his own.

programme.title: Take Me Back for Christmas
programme.desc: A Christmas wish grants Renée the successful life she's always dreamed of -- except she finds herself no longer married to her beloved husband.

programme.title: Holiday Road
programme.desc: Stranded at an airport, a group of holiday travelers agrees to rent a van for a road trip to Denver. When their unexpected journey leads them into uncharted territory, they must navigate a series of misadventures that brings them closer together.

programme.title: The Royal Nanny
programme.desc: Working under cover as a nanny, an MI5 agent must resist the charms of Prince Colin while keeping the royal family safe during Christmastime.

programme.title: Sealed With a List
programme.desc: This holiday season, festive Carley sets out to conquer her list of abandoned resolutions from last year. Aided by co-worker Wyatt, she finds love and the confidence to chase her dreams.

programme.title: Cross Country Christmas
programme.desc: When a snowstorm disrupts both Lina's and Max's holiday plans, they realize they must work together to find a way home -- without taking it out on each other.

programme.title: The Sweetest Christmas
programme.desc: A struggling pastry chef is thrilled to learn that she has made it to the finals of the American Gingerbread Competition, but distractions in her love life threaten to derail her dreams of taking home the grand prize.

programme.title: Christmas Made to Order
programme.desc: When an architect finds himself hosting his family for Christmas, he turns to a holiday coordinator for help. Her expert Christmas spirit brings his family together, but neither expected it to bring them closer to each other.

programme.title: Finding Mr. Christmas
programme.desc: Ten men compete in a series of festive challenges that will showcase their acting chops and their holiday spirit; Jonathan Bennett hosts while these lovable guys vie to become the next Hallmark leading man.

programme.title: Finding Mr. Christmas
programme.desc: Ten men compete in a series of festive challenges that will showcase their acting chops and their holiday spirit; Jonathan Bennett hosts while these lovable guys vie to become the next Hallmark leading man.

programme.title: The Christmas Note
programme.desc: Gretchen returns to her hometown and meets her neighbor Melissa. They form a reluctant friendship when Melissa discovers she has a sibling she never knew about, and through their detective work, they uncover a huge surprise.

programme.title: Journey Back to Christmas
programme.desc: A nurse (Candace Cameron Bure) from World War II is transported in time to 2016 and meets a man who helps her discover the bonds of family and that the true meaning of Christmas is timeless.

programme.title: A Season for Family
programme.desc: Maddy's adopted son, Wesley, has just one wish for Christmas -- to meet his brother, Cody, who was adopted into a different family. Circumstances soon bring the two siblings together while sparks fly between their respective parents.

programme.title: A Christmas Tree Grows in Colorado
programme.desc: A woman who is in charge of her town's Christmas celebration must win over a firefighter to obtain a magnificent spruce tree from his property for the festivities.

programme.title: Nantucket Noel
programme.desc: Tensions rise when a woman falls for the son of a developer who wants to tear down the wharf that is home to her toy store.

programme.title: Rocky Mountain Christmas
programme.desc: Sarah heads to her uncle's ranch to escape New York and the spotlight from a breakup. Returning home for the first time since her aunt passed, complications arise when Graham, a Hollywood star, arrives at the ranch to prepare for his next film.

programme.title: Christmas in Toyland
programme.desc: A toy store data analyst tries to save hundreds of jobs right before Christmas to help keep the in-store experience alive.

programme.title: Christmas Scavenger Hunt
programme.desc: When Belinda heads to her hometown for the holidays, things get complicated when she is forced to team up with her ex-boyfriend Dustin for the town's annual Christmas scavenger hunt.

programme.title: Christmas Wonderland
programme.desc: Heidi returns home to watch her niece and nephew and comes face to face with her high school love. Heidi offers to help him with a dance, and the more time she spends decorating, the more she finds herself inspired to start painting again.

programme.title: A Bride for Christmas
programme.desc: Aiden (Andrew Walker) bets his friends that he can convince a woman to marry him by Christmas, and he sets his sights on Jessie (Arielle Kebbel), a young woman who has sworn off serious relationships.

programme.title: Christmas Wishes & Mistletoe Kisses
programme.desc: Weeks before Christmas, an interior designer is hired to decorate the estate of a wealthy businessman.

programme.title: Christmas at Grand Valley
programme.desc: Kelly returns to Grand Valley for Christmas. When Leo, a single dad, arrives in town with his kids to review a hotel, the two cross paths. As Kelly re-experiences traditions with Leo, she begins to find her way back to her passion for art.

programme.title: Family for Christmas
programme.desc: After an offhand wish to a man playing Santa Claus, a woman wakes up to find herself married to her college sweetheart.

programme.title: Christmas in Angel Falls
programme.desc: Guardian angel Gabby is sent to the town of Angel Falls to restore its Christmas spirit. As she helps the townspeople to revive their traditions, Gabby meets a volunteer fire chief who teaches her the truth about the love she admires from afar.

programme.title: Every Christmas Has a Story
programme.desc: While on air, a TV personality accidentally admits she hates Christmas. When she goes to a small town to film a special to repair her image, the Christmas spirit begins to change her life.

programme.title: Christmas Under the Stars
programme.desc: Nick loses his high finance job right before Christmas. Lost, he takes a gig at a tree lot, where he meets Julie and her son, Matt.

programme.title: Christmas in Homestead
programme.desc: An actress heads to the Christmas-obsessed town of Homestead, Iowa, to shoot a holiday-themed movie. She is shocked when a romance blooms with Matt, a single dad. As she gets a taste of small-town life, she discovers the true meaning of Christmas.

programme.title: A World Record Christmas
programme.desc: An boy with autism is determined to break a Guinness World Record by stacking 1,400 blocks. In the spirit of the holiday, his mother and stepfather organize a fundraiser to give the townspeople an opportunity to decorate and donate a block.

programme.title: A Blue Ridge Mountain Christmas
programme.desc: Hotel manager Willow returns to her stunning Virginia hometown to help her sister plan a Christmas wedding at the inn her family once owned.

programme.title: Christmas Connection
programme.desc: Sydney is tasked with looking after Leah, an unaccompanied minor. After Leah is safely delivered, Sydney finds a package Leah left behind and decides to deliver it. When she misses her connection, she is invited to spend the holidays with them.

programme.title: The Gift of Peace
programme.desc: Traci is a once-devout Christian who stopped believing in God after her husband tragically died despite her prayers. As her second Christmas without him approaches, she tries going to a support group for inspiration and comfort.

programme.title: The Christmas Club
programme.desc: Two busy strangers meet when they help an elderly woman find her lost Christmas savings. Thanks to fate and Christmas magic, they also find something they were both missing: true love.

programme.title: Unlocking Christmas
programme.desc: When a mysterious key and a cryptic holiday riddle arrive on their doorsteps, Kate and Kevin embark on a romantic Christmas adventure.

programme.title: The Christmas Secret
programme.desc: A struggling single mother (Bethany Joy Lenz) searches for a lost family heirloom that she hopes will bring her love and good fortune in time for the holidays.

programme.title: Love You Like Christmas
programme.desc: A high-powered executive reconsiders her priorities when car trouble leads her to Christmas Valley, a town in love with Christmas.

programme.title: A Christmas Melody
programme.desc: A single mother moves back to her hometown with her young daughter. Having a hard time adjusting, the daughter seeks help from her music teacher to write a song for the Christmas variety show.

programme.title: Rukomet - Mađarska liga (Ž): Mosonmagyarovar - Debrecen
programme.desc: Žensko, rukometno prvenstvo Mađarske je takmičenje koje okuplja najbolje, profesionalne ekipe ove zemlje. Takmičenje se održava u organizaciji Mađarskog rukometnog saveza. (LIVE).

programme.title: Zlatni golovi YU sporta
programme.desc: Mnogo je velikih momenata u istoriji jugoslovenskog fudbala, a mi smo izdvojili samo najbolje od najboljeg. Uvek je lepo setiti se tih lepih trenutaka.

programme.title: F1 - GP Confidential
programme.desc: Zavirite u unutrašnjost najbržih bolida na svetu, pogledajte kako se sve sastavlja i kako sve funkcioniše.

programme.title: Košarka - Eurocup: Venezia - Turk Telekom
programme.desc: Drugo po težini takmičenje u evropskoj klubskoj košarci sigurno zavređuje pažnju ljubitelja košarke. Iako je pomalo u senci Evrolige, Evrokup nudi obilje iznenađenja i kvalitetne košarke. (LIVE).

programme.title: Pregled Biciklizam: Saitama Criterium: Saitama Criterium
programme.desc: Pratite biciklističku trku Saitama Criterium, koja se održava 6. novembra 2022. godine u Saitami u Japanu. Ovo takmičenje se održava od 2013. godine u organizaciji Saitama Sports Commissiona.

programme.title: Omaž zvezdama
programme.desc: Bokseri, fudbaleri, košarkaši... Najbolji sportisti svih vremena, iz svih sportova. Na istom mestu, u isto vreme, kako ih uporediti i kako napraviti večne liste.

programme.title: Fudbal - Grčka liga: PAOK - Olympiacos
programme.desc: Voli se fudbal u Grčkoj i svaki duel, pogotovo derbi, doživljava se sa mnogo strasti. Olimpijakos jeste favorit za titulu, ali AEK, PAOK i večiti rival Panatinaikos kucaju na vrata...
